content.raw: I am wondering how we are going to localize in the world frame after teleportation.  If we are going to localize using local features and a tool like amcl, then we need a map.  However, the course is randomized, so there is no use in creating a pre-made map of the environment.  Even if we are going to use SLAM, then when you teleport, there is no way to know what the course was between your teleporting locations, so there is no way to localize to the world frame.
